chatanimation.description: Improves the chat visuals by adding smooth animations. Also removes the message indicator, the line to the left of messages.

eg-inventory-blur.description: Applies the new menu background blur to Inventories such as chests, the player inventory, etc.

cavedust.description: Adds the white ash particle from the Basalt Deltas biome to the underground to simulate dust.

sounds.description: Adds a variety of new sound effects and improves existing ones that don't quite fit.

visuality.description: Adds a bunch of new particles such as crystal sparkles, particles on mob hitting, custom blob particles for slimes and environmental particles.

subtle_effects.description: Adds many new subtle details through particles and a few sounds.

particular.description: Enhances Minecraft's ambience with visual effects like fireflies, falling leaves, and waterfall cascades.

make_bubbles_pop.description: Makes bubble particles pop and lets them rise realistically to the water surface.

fallingleaves.description: Adds a neat little particle effect to leaf blocks.

distanthorizons.description: Add simplified terrain past Minecraft's default view distance to improve performance and allow for longer draw distances. Can cause crashes.

betterclouds.description: Replaces the default clouds with beautiful clouds in touch with the vanilla style.
